Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 82nd overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2002...
Released by Chicago (N) on 2/28/2006...
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2008...
Injured on 7/10/2008 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Atlanta to Minnesota on 2/25/2010 (Going to ATL: P M. Harvey. Going to MIN: LF B. Harper, 1B J. Smoak, P J. Rowen)...
Injured on 7/28/2010 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/4/2010 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2012, off Ryan Anderson (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2012, off Todd Noel (CLE)...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2012, hitting .256 with 20 HR, 83 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Toronto on 7/8/2013...
Injured on 5/26/2015 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 7/31/2015...
Traded from Minnesota to Atlanta on 1/31/2016 (Going to MIN: P J. Thompson. Going to ATL: 1B J. Smoak)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/8/2016 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/2017, hitting .464 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 8/11/2017...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (A) on 8/17/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/2017, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Milwaukee on 8/23/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/2017, hitting .538 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2017, hitting .491 with 7 HR, 43 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/2018, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 8 runs against Montreal on 7/31/2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/15/2019 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...

Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
